summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Helene Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Human Hair Body Wave Top Lace Closure (4"4") Part 8-20 Inch Naturl Black Bleached Knots (18 Inch)
Review Date: 2015/08/28
Store: Helene Hair
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Helene Hair', 'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 5.4 x 1.5 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '889583690927'}
Review Text: These closures never disappoint. I usually get the 10 or 12 inch closures but this time I got the 18 inch closure and its still beautiful. The hair is soft and luscious as always and the ends are healthy and full. I used these closure every time I make a wig I DO NOT WEAR SEW-INS only wigs. I have purchased over 15 of these closures, I love them and will continue to buy.
Review Title: Great closure and great hair as ALWAYS!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals
Review Date: 2016/01/02
Store: Pure Body Naturals
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'}
Review Text: This is some great shampoo. I have tried several argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best. Great smell and leaves the hair soft before conditioning. Usually with shampoo, the hair feels dry but not with this. I even used this one time without conditioning afterwards and my hair was still soft and smelled really good.
Review Title: I have tried several Argan oil shampoos and this is by far the best.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sunwell Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Closure 3.5x4 Kinky Curly Human Hair Lace Closure with Baby Hair Bleached Knots Natural Color Free Part 10
Review Date: 2016/07/22
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '732840237895'}
Review Text: Ordered 3 curly bundles from another vendor and needed a closure. This closure blended great. I bleached the knots of the closure. Soft and great hair. This texture of hair requires heavy maintenance but it's amazing hair for the price.
Review Title: Love this texture.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ATOZWIG 7A Malaysian Virgin Hair Straight Lace Frontal Closure 13"x4" Lace Frontal Closure Soft Malaysian Straight Closure 16 inch
Review Date: 2017/05/13
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 7.5 x 0.5 inches; 1.6 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great Frontal. Soft Silky and Full!!
Review Title: Great Frontal.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Alibd 8A Brazilian Virgin Hair Body Wave 3 Bundles 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extension Wavy Style for Women, Natural Black(16 18 20 Inch)
Review Date: 2017/11/10
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'weave', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.31 x 10.31 x 2.05 inches; 10.56 Ounces'}
Review Text: For a second I was skeptical because 3 bundles 16,18,20 for only $52 cant be real hair but you know what this is some good hair. Out the package the hair was a bit dry but i washed it and then deep conditioned and the hair had a nice wave to it and was soooooo soft, no shedding, few small hairs and true to length. I colored the ends using Loreal Hicolor in the color natural blonde and the hair colored amazing. Did not damage the hair and the color is so vibrant and amazing. The only reason im giving this 4 stars is because the ends of the hair were thinner than any hair i've ever receieved. But the hair is absolutely gorg. Ive had this hair for almost 2 months and still is as soft and great as when I purchased it. This hair never tangles and I only get 1-2 strands of shedding per day if that.
Review Title: Soooooo Soft.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: USOFT Brazilian Virgin Straight Human Hair Bundles 1 Bundle (20 inch) Natural Color 100% Unprocessed 8A Grade Brazilian Virgin Hair Soft And Tangle Free
Review Date: 2017/11/29
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Color': 'Natural', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'UPC': '613852777947'}
Review Text: Great hair super soft and full. Silky, true to length and has lasted me months. Ordered a 14,18, and 22in. No shedding and no smell! Such a great buy!! I get soooo many compliments on this pretty hair!!
Review Title: AMAZING ! ! ! !
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a strong preference for high-quality human hair products, particularly closures and extensions, which have received consistently positive feedback. Their ratings trend towards the higher end (4-5 stars), indicating satisfaction with products that feel soft, maintain their quality over time, and require minimal shedding. 

A common theme emerges around the use case of creating wigs rather than sew-in styles, reflecting a distinct interest in versatile and easily manageable hair solutions. This preference for wig-centric products indicates a desire for flexibility in styling while maintaining natural aesthetics.

Quality consistently takes precedence over price; although they exhibit some price sensitivity—expressing skepticism about low-cost options—they ultimately report satisfaction with budget-friendly purchases that deliver quality results. The buyer favors products that are easy to care for, as evidenced by positive remarks on items that remain soft and vibrant after coloring and treatment.

Overall, this analysis reveals a clear affinity for versatile, high-quality hair products that allow for creative expression, alongside a practical approach to maintenance and care.

target_interaction.title: So Silky and Flowy!!!
target_interaction.text: I got 4 bundles for $89. I got color #2 in 14 and 16 in. Then got a #33 14in and #4 16in. This hair was colored so perfectly. The texture of the hair was great and the bundles have a great luster. The bundles have thin ends and that's the only thing I disliked. But for the price of the bundles I expected that. No tangling, shedding, the color is even and the wig turned out great a pop with the peek a boo color underneath. I wore it to a concert and was asked 3 times about my hair. Good Buy!
target_interaction.title_meta: JulyQueen Medium Auburn Virgin Straight Hair Weaves 8A Grade Peruvian Hair One Bundle Unprocessed Light Chocolate Brown Color Human Hair Extensions Remy Hair Weaves 16inch
